Review Text: My first experience of Teppanyaki and it was delicious. Watching the chef was mesmerizing and his dishes melted in your mouth.

Review Title: All perfect... from arriving to leaving
Review Text:
Great lunch - privat room/ table for any size of guest.

Pricy ? Noooo... for what you get and the service they serve you is fair

Yes... we will be back
Yes... we will recommend to everybody 

Thx for great experience at your nice place

Review Title: Great but expensive Teppayaki in HCMC
Review Text: Spotless restaurant, with great staff. Our chef was a culinary magician. But abselutely on the prices side when comparing to the Changhai Teppan places where it is all you can eat.

We have been here a couple of times now and we’re never disappointed. 
Professional friendly staff and very good food quality. I love their Teppanyaki beef.

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 5
Dịch vụ: 5
Đồ ăn: 5
Review Text:
We were passing through HCMC and decided it was a great opportunity to experience a world famous Kobe beef steak. On arrival we were escorted to our room and allocated a dedicated server who took our order. We opted for a Kobe set menu and a Foie Gras set menu. In the UK this would be called a fine dining tasting menu Our allocated chef appeared and set up to prepare the meal on the hot plate in front of us.
The Foie Gras menu included courses of prawns, scallops, salmon, foie gras and Australian rib eye. See photos. The skill and hand speed of our chef was phenomenal as she cooked and prepared the various courses. The Kobe was melt in the mouth special. The textures, flavours and presentation of all the dishes are up there with some Michelin starred restaurants I have visited.
Sitting at a table with a chef preparing food at the table may not suit anyone looking for a quiet intimate experience. But we found it to be a fantastic gastronomic experience. Fabulous.

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 5
Dịch vụ: 5
Đồ ăn: 5
Review Text:
I had my birthday celebration dinner with my family at this restaurant. We all enjoyed the food and experienced a great cooking show by the chef.

Lobster, kobe beef, seafood are all fresh. Staffs are friendly and cozy atmosphere restaurant. The only cons is that the bill is a bit heavy. 😉

Anyway it’s worth for a birthday dinner! 5 stars ⭐️!

Wine list was not impressive. A lot of wines were sold out. The starters and others were good but unfortunately when the main course beef was cooked it was delayed by the decos and when the food reached our mouths it was not warm. The quality of the beef was on par but it would have been nice if it were hot. Lastly, the restaurant need some 5S such as leaving the baby chairs right outside. Not pleasing to the eye
厳選された素材と熟練された調理法で、技術と同時に美しさがあります。鉄板焼きカウンターでは、音と香りも楽しめます。

高級日本式鉄板焼。コースで頂きました。
所謂シェフのパフォーマンスもあり、日本の食文化を楽しむにも良いと思います。

Quand on va à un restaurant Teppanyaki, on s’attend à une cuisine spectaculaire.  Mon expérience fut plutôt quelconque, le cuisinier très jeune ( en âge et en expérience) a enchaîné des gestes automatiques, sans aucune interaction avec les clients.
Nous avons choisi du bœuf de Kobe qualité A5 et A4, les morceaux apportés n’étaient pas des morceaux de meilleurs choix (presence de nerfs et de gras pure) , du coup le rebut est important .
Bref, pour le prix payé (4000000VND pour 2 personnes sans alcool) pas d’effet waouh ...
La référence à Saigon reste le restaurant japonais authentique Sushi Rei

Review Title: The 10 day long tour was a fabulous dinner.
Review Text: Very good restaurants with a smaal tour group that included lunch and dinner. But the last dinner was crowned with Kobe, a Japanese restaurant. The atmosphere, service, quality of good, etc. were scrumptious with one word.

Review Title: kobe and dinner here was good! but staff not good
Review Text:
we had a reservation at 7:30pm, my sister had a little bit late and we must wait for her, we had oder sashimi and some drinks to wait, but seen that the staff felt unhappy for it, she had no smiling and no asking from the start time until we are leave and when my sister had arrived her face be like “thanks god, finally!!” we are
recommend this place to anyone because
food was great, but the staff have not much skills to work at an expensive place, we paid for 10.000.000 vnd for 4 persons for a few hour dinner and we we got not enought what we are pay for

Lovely, old colonial house, with different Teppanyaki rooms. We had our private one and food was very delicious. We missed the chef entertainment and active participation during the cocking. Pity, was not so emotional as used to be.

The food was great, the prices were on the high side but not unreasonable, the service was all right. What totally spoiled it for me was the noise. There was a large, noisy group in the room next door, and the doors were only screen doors, so they did noting to block out the sounds.

Review Title: Leckeres Rind - ob Kobe weiß man nicht
Review Text:
Ob hie Original Kobe angeboten wird weiss ich nicht, da es für mich das erste Mal "Kobe" war. Für rund 75 Euro erhält man hier Kobe der höchsten VERFÜGBAREN Stufe (A5) in einem Set mit Vorspeisen, Misosuppe, Salat und Eis. Die Vorführung ist nett und alle Speisen sehr lecker.

Einen Stern Abzug da das Restaurant auf die Preise am Ende nochmal 10% Steuer UND NOCHMAL 10% "Service Charge" aufschlagen. Das bringt am Ende einen Faden Beigeschmack. Zu Zweit waren wir so bei 174 Euro, aber einem netten Abend und LECKEREM Essen.

Zum Kobe: Es ist extrem zart gewesen und weich, sehr schmackhaft und lecker. Das berühmte "zerschmelzen" auf der Zunge konnte ich aber nicht feststellen

Zum Service: hier waren wir durchweg zufrieden. Kaum Wartezeit und immer höflich gewesen.

名前が神戸ですが、神戸肉を使ってないことを入店時に告げられました。
正直です。
目の前で焼いてもらえる部屋で食事しました。
4人で行きましたので、それぞれが違うものを注文しシェアしました。
Nhà hàng nằm trên một con phố nhỏ yên tĩnh. Thức ăn có mức trung bình cao và giá quá cao cho những gì họ cung cấp. Sẽ không quay trở lại nữa.
捲牛肉還行，鮭魚也還可以，厚切牛肉就不太行有點老，大頭蝦好吃，豆腐跟炒飯普普，總結是沒那價值，而且要加收20%，10%服務費10%稅，這樣兩人就150萬，

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 5
Dịch vụ: 5
Đồ ăn: 4
Review Title: Nơi tốt cho một bữa ăn tối lãng mạn hoặc một nhóm bạn
Review Text:
Chúng tôi được cung cấp toàn bộ phòng chỉ cho hai người chúng tôi. Các nhân viên đã rất chu đáo và bầu không khí là đẹp.
Nhà hàng nằm trong một biệt thự thuộc địa xinh đẹp, nơi có thêm bầu không khí tuyệt vời. Các cửa sổ mở ra và không khí vào buổi tối thật tuyệt.
Thức ăn ngon, nhưng với điều kiện chúng ta đang ở Việt Nam, quốc gia nơi hải sản tươi sống ở khắp mọi nơi, thức ăn trong kobe không có gì nổi bật, nhưng là món ăn ngon của teppanyaki.

Mặc dù tôi không chắc liệu Kobe có phải là A 5 hay không, nó vẫn thực sự tốt. Tất cả trong một bữa ăn ngon, với bộ thịt bò 'kobe' đến với giá khá hợp lý. Món khai vị salad với cá hồi cũng rất tuyệt vời.

지인의 추천으로 방문하였는데 추천 시 조용한 방이 따로 마련되어 있어 비즈니스시 손님들과 편안히 대화를 나누면서 식사를 할 수 있다고 하여 방문하였다.
방문 시 제법 오래된 식당의 포스와  직원들의 응대가 괜찮다고 생각했다.
직원의 도움을 받으며 주문을 하게 되었는데 일본에서 오늘 도착한 조개라면서 추천한 메뉴가 나와 있는 사진과 실물은 차이가 너무  많이 나는 걸 같이 간 일행과 공감하면서 이건 아니지 하면서 식사를 하였다.
전반적인 서비스 품질은 우수한 편이나 역시 식당은 음식 맛으로 승부를 해야하는데 이점은 다소 미흡한 것 같다.
입맛이 까다로운 사람들은 평가를 저조하게 할 것 같고 그냥 조용한 방에서 큰 부담없이 식사를 하기에는 나쁘진 않은 것 같다.

Review Title: 令人會想再訪的鐵板燒
Review Text: 隔了大概三年吧～再訪神戶鐵板燒!一樣好吃!兩個人各一份套餐神戶牛肉片卷用奶油炒過的蒜蓉跟青蔥，吃起來美味極了!煎鮭魚全給老公吃，因為不敢吃鮭魚，老公覺得不錯。火燒干貝一樣美味!今天的蝦子超級大隻，應該是大頭蝦，活跳跳的在做垂死的掙扎，蝦膏濃郁蝦肉彈牙，非常好吃！炒飯粒粒分明！還額外點了蘆筍和好吃的大阪燒！最後還是沒吃飽追加牛排，可惜沒有ribeye了，只好點tenderloin，也不錯就少了一些牛脂香氣。整體來講還是很棒！Love it！❤👍❤👍

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 4
Dịch vụ: 1
Đồ ăn: 4
Review Title: Thức ăn rất ngon, nhưng nó không đáng giá trong gần một giờ chờ đợi để được phục vụ.
Review Text: Chúng tôi đã chờ gần một giờ để được phục vụ mà không có một lời từ bất kỳ nhân viên nào ở đó. Chúng tôi đặt bàn lúc 8: 15 và chờ 25 phút để ngồi, 30 phút nữa cho món ăn đầu tiên của chúng tôi được phục vụ. Các nhân viên tiếp tục chạy vào và ra mà không nói bất cứ điều gì cho đến khi tôi phàn nàn rằng chúng tôi đã chờ đợi một thời gian rồi, họ chỉ nói xin lỗi vì họ quá bận rộn và thế thôi, thậm chí không nói với tôi khi thức ăn có thể sẵn sàng. Kinh nghiệm thực sự xấu!
非常好吃，廚師.服務生都非常有禮貌，食材新鮮，廚師調味將食物風味完美展現，氣氛好，搭配精湛的鐵板手藝視覺也大呼過癮。
